title: Use of phylogenetic tress with 5 answer options

content.question: A number of different phylogenies (evolutionary trees) have been proposed by scientists. These phylogenies are useful because they can be used to

choices.label: determine when two similar populations of a species evolved into two separate species
evaluate which groups of organisms may be most closely related
demonstrate that all photosynthetic organ-isms are members of the Kingdom Plantae
demonstrate that natural selection is the prevailing force in evolution
demonstrate which taxa (groups of organisms) contain the most highly evolved species

content.answer: evaluate which groups of organisms may be most closely related
